mapper.select: select b.userId, b.caring, b.intro, b.job, b.btype, b.activity, b.create_date, b.apply_date, m.username, m.birth, m.address from bsapply b left outer join member m on b.userid = m.userid where reason is null order by b.create_date

select b.userId, b.caring, b.intro, b.job, b.btype, b.activity, b.apply_date, m.username, m.birth, m.address from bsapply b left outer join member m on b.userid = m.userid where b.userId = #{ userId }
